name: Tarnow Souls
description:
Find your way out or restore Tarnow's former glory in this new indie souls like game! John Dark Souls wakes in the city of Tarnow after linking the flame, where Curse of the Bums took control over the city, they need to get back to his own universe to start ng+, but in order to do that he has to defeat the Emperor of Tarnow and claim his crown. Explore various locations of Tarnow and defeat drunk enemies that succumb to the Curse of the Bums, discover lore of the fallen city in this Dark Souls-inspired game coming to Gamejolt and Itch.io on 5th of August 2022!

Version 1.0.2 Patch Notes:

-Removed infamous jump attack sidewalk :')

-Fixed bug where music stopped after starting opening cutscene

-Fixed bug where sometimes you could dodge window during second part of normal attack
